title: Zoë Porphyrogenita
summary: Zoë Porphyrogenita (Medieval Greek: Ζωή Πορφυρογέννητη Medieval Greek: [zoˈi] "life"; c. 978 – 1050) was Byzantine Empress from 11 November 1028 until her death in 1050, briefly ruling in her own right from April to June 1042, alongside her sister Theodora Porphyrogenita.
